Html:
It seems that the satellite assembly won't work with tooltip of system buttons on ModernWindow.

FirstFloor.ModernUI.Resources.zh-Hans.txt
Cancel=取消
Close=关闭
Maximize=最大化
Minimize=最小化
NavigationFailed=导航失败
NavigationFailedFrameNotFound=不能导航到 {0}，找不到任何 ModernFrame 目标 '{1}'
NavigationFailedSourceNotSpecified=不能导航到 {0}，未指定源
No=否
Ok=确定
Restore=还原
UIThreadRequired=操作需要UI线程
UnexpectedToken=意外的令牌
UnknownTokenType=未知令牌类型
Yes=是
